1.「ハ…ハ～イ ミヤビちゃん！| ひさしぶり～ 元気してた～？: Hi, Miyabi! Long time no see~ How have you|been?

2.「オーイッ！ ミヤビっち～！| 遊び人 やめたって聞いたけど ウソっしょ！？|: Oi! Miyabi! I heard you quit being a gadabout.|Are you kidding me? And have you heard about|Labor Demon Deathwork?

4.「仕事中だって 見たら わかるでしょ！| デスワークなんて 知らないし～っ！|: You'd know it if you saw me at work! I don't|know anything about death work! I stopped|being a gadabout a long time ago!

5.「ガビィーン！！ オーッ ミヤビィーッ！| アソビニン やめちまうなんて トンデ: Gabyeeeeeeen!!! Oh, Mya-bee! Asobinin, there's|no way in hell I'm quitting!

6.「……マ？ マジっすか～？ 労働嫌いで有名な| あの孤高のイタ映え女王 ミヤビさ:
Is this for real? Are you serious? What kind|of a terrible thing happened to Miyabi, that|solitary Queen of Mischief who is famous for|
|her hatred of work?

7.「……キッカケは ともかく～ッ アタシは| 農家として生きていくことに 決めたの: I decided to become a farmer! I was awakened|by the dangers of working!

8.「最近は ぜんぜん寝てないくらい 働いてて～。| もうまじ ハタケ中毒……ってカ:
I've been working so hard lately that I|haven't slept at all. I'm really addicted to|hatake! I can't think of anything else but|
|hatake right now!

9.「……なのに～ ここんとこ ハタケの元気が| ビミョーだから ガチで 手が離せな: I don't have time to talk to you guys!

10.「……そーゆーことだから| 仕事のジャマ しないでくれる？| ハナシは終わり！: So... can you stop interrupting my work,|please? End of story! You're interrupting my|work!

11.「ミヤビちゃん…… ああは言ってたけど| あんまり 楽しそーじゃなかったね～。|: Miyabi... you said so, but you didn't seem to|be having much fun. It's tough, but you have|to do it, right?

12.「それなー。寝不足なのか しんどそーだった。| あれが 労魔デスワークの仕業だっ:
That's right. He looked like he was having a|hard time sleeping. If that was the work of|Labor Demon Deathwork, I can't leave him|
|alone.

14.「ミヤビっち 畑の元気がなくて| 手が離せないって 言ってたよな。だったら| い:
Miyabi, you said that the fields are not|healthy and you can't take your hands off|them. Well, let's help him out with some good|
|fertilizer!

15.「……で <pc>っち！| ちと 悪いんだけど| 肥料の件は ぜんぶ まかせるわ: So, <pc>! I'm sorry, but I'll leave|the fertilizer thing entirely to you!

16.「えっ <pc>さんだけに まかせるんす？| そりゃあ アゲアゲな <pc>さん:
What? You're just going to let |handle it? Well, if you're a big fan of|, you might be able to get away|
|with it, but... what about us?

17.「ヘヘッ そこはそれ。オレらには| ちと 別件で やることがあるんだわ～。: That's the thing. We have other things to do.

18.「いいか～ この村の近くにある 知恵の社で| 肥料のことを調べて バッチリ手に入:
Listen up~ We'll go to the Wisdom Altar near|this village, check out the fertilizer, and|get it right. Then we'll reconvene at Miyabi's|
|place!

19.「知恵の社は ツスクル平野の北西にあるぜ～。| <pc>っち 肥料のことは シク:
Wisdom Altar is located in the northwest of|Tsusukul Plains! , please take|care of the fertilizer! So, it's time to call|
|it a day~!

20.「……なにこれ？ このエナジーパウダーをまけば| ハタケが 元気になるって？ ウ: What is this? This Energy Powder is supposed|to make the hatake healthier? No way! You're a|gadabout and you're really saying that?

21.「……でも せっかく 持ってきてくれたなら| ちょっとだけ 試してみよっかな。: But since you brought it here, I'll give it a|try.

22.「……アタシ 最近 ハタケのこと わかるの。| ハタケのバイブス…… ぐんぐん: Lately I've been getting to know Hatake. His|vibes are moving up rapidly. Your fertilizer|seems to have done the trick!

23.「ひゅーっ！ さすがは <pc>っち！| もう肥料を見つけて 畑にまいてくれたん: Whew! That's what I'm talking about,|<pc>! I see you've already found the|fertilizer and spread it on the fields.

24.「アハハ！ ミヤビっち～ 遅れてスマン。| ちと 作るのに 手こずっちまってさ…: Ahahaha! Miyabi~ Sorry I'm late. It took me a|while to make it, but... here it is! Present|for you!

26.「安眠香っつーお香！ 寝てないって言ってたろ？| なんか ミヤビっち しんどそー:
Sleeping incense! You said you didn't sleep,|right? Miyabi seemed to be having a hard time.|It's fine to work, but at least get a good|
|night's sleep!

27.「はぁ～？ アンタたち さっきから| 遊び人のクセして なんで やさしいの！？|: Huh? You guys are such gadabouts, why are you|being so nice to me! You're really funny! I|can't believe it!

28.「……でも ありがたく 受け取っとく！| チョー うれしい！ まじ ありがと！: But I received it gratefully! I'm so|happy! Thank you!

29.「<pc>さんに 肥料を頼んでる間に| オレたちで 安眠香を作ってたんすよ～！|: While we were asking <pc> for|fertilizer, we were making our own sleeping|incense~! Oh man, that was a lot of work!

30.「ルッチーさんは ペアレンツから教わって| 調合の心得も あるんすわ！| サクッ:
Mr. Lucchie learned from the Parents and has a|knack for mixing and blending! He can make a|sleeping incense so quickly and easily, it's|
|amazing~!

31.「……あのさ。いろいろ 助けてもらったし？| なんか お礼がしたいんだけど……|: You know... You helped me a lot. I'd like to|thank you in some way, but I haven't grown any|vegetables yet, so...

32.「アハハッ！ 野菜も 気になるんだけどさ～| オレっち ミヤビっちが 遊び人をや: Hahaha! I'm curious about vegetables too, but|I want to know why Miyabi and I stopped|playing gadabouts. Please tell me.

33.「……ふーん。そんなのでイイなら 話したげる。| でも じつは ハッキリ覚えてな: Hmmm... I'll tell you if that's okay. But the|truth is, I don't remember it clearly.

34.「それが……ある夜 突然 働きたくなったの。| 遊び人とか まじムダだって 急に:
Then... one night, all of a sudden, I wanted|to work. I suddenly realized that gadabouts|were a waste of time. And the next day, I was|
|already growing hatake.

35.「ある夜……？ ミヤビっち。| その日のこと くわしく 思いだせる？: One night...? Miyabi. Do you remember that day|any more?

36.「……うーん。なんかぁ～| 記憶が ボンヤリしてんだけどぉ～。: Hmmm... I don't know... my memory is a little|fuzzy...

37.「あ～っ！ そういえば！ イタ映え絶景のこと| 話した日があったじゃん！ 遊び人:
Ahhh! Oh, by the way! There was the day I told|you about the Ita Ei Ei Ei Zekkei! The day I|quit being a gadabout was the day I met|
|Lucchie at the Gadabode!

39.「そうだ……思いだした。| そんで 遊びハウスに 寄った帰り道……| 怪しげな: That's right...I remember now. On my way home|from the Gadabode, I met two suspicious-|looking couples.

40.「……ピエロとバニーの格好をした ふたり組に。: ...to a pair dressed as a clown and a bunny.

41.「……ピエロとバニーのふたり組？| それが もしかして 労魔デスワーク……？: A couple of clowns and bunnies? Is that|perhaps Labor Demon Deathwork...?

42.「ごめん。思いだせたのは ここまで。| ……あんま 役に立たなそーだよね。: Sorry. This is all I could remember. ...I|don't think it's very useful.

43.「いやいや～！ 充分だよ ミヤビっち。| 忙しいとこ ジャマしたね。まじ 助かっ: No, no~! That's enough, Miyabi. Sorry to|interrupt your busy time. Thank you so much!|Let me know when the vegetables are ready!

44.「<pc>っちも 肥料 サンキューな！| ……とりま 今回の目的は果たせたし|: <pc>, thanks for the fertilizer!|Well, now that we've accomplished what we set|out to do, let's go back to the Gadabode!
